name: Kung Fu FIGHT!
description:
Fight the bad guys, save the girl -
you know the drill! Relentless
old-school action as you run, jump
and fight your way through your quest
of rescue and revenge.

• Non-stop action!
• Retro-styled, old school gameplay.
• Battle through varied environments
against unique enemies.
• Multiple difficulty modes add
challenge and replayability.
